{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Medialink |model=MWN-WAPR150N |revision= |upc=813077011387 |ean= |asin=B0044YU60M |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/12/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tenda |manuf_model=W268R |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XKPMWN-WAPR150N,V7TW268R |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;212, 6691, A121;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=medialink |default_ssid_regex=^medialink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=14:35:8B |oui_eth=14:35:8B }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Broadband Router with Internal Antenna}}
[http://medialinkproducts.com/wirelessRouter.php Product page] It is possible that the hardware of these units may vary... Per WiGLE and the User Guide, the default SSID seems to be '''medialink''' w/ an OUI of 14:35:8B ('''Mediabridge Products'''). ==Additional external links== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=617552 On the DD-WRT forums] (internal photos) :4MB Flash ('''Macronix''' MX29LV320EBTI-70G) and 16MB RAM ('''EtronTech''' EM639165TS-6G) in ''Broesph''s post :9V, 0.6A on the label :similar appearance to the [[Tenda W268R (later)]] *[https://chary.us/blog/2011/12/mwn-wapr150n-firmware.html'''MediaLink MWN-WAPR150N Firmware Hacking''' on Zach Bloomquist's blog] ==Images== ===[[User:M86|M86]]'s images=== File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_angled.jpg|angled File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_unit_bottom.jpg|unit bottom File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_label.jpg|unit label File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_back.jpg|unit back File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_board_top_in_case.jpg|board top, in case File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_board_top2.jpg|board top, in case, 2 File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_board_top_angledFfront.jpg|board top, angled, from the front File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_board_top_angledFback.jpg|board top, angled, from the back File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_antenna.jpg|antenna File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_Flash.jpg|Flash File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_RAM.jpg|RAM File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_RF_top.jpg|heatsink'ed SoC, RF File:Medialink_MWN-WAPR150N_board_bot.jpg|board bottom {{#set:Has images=external|Has images=internal|Has images=label}}
